attributes.action: Start teaching schoolchildren basic first aid in school
attributes.additional_details: It would be a very useful life skill and could be used in the rare case someone is struggling for their life. Not only this it could inspire some people to join first aid response teams in later life
attributes.background: Teach children in primary and/or secondary schools how to do basic first aid response such as cpr.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584705
